subject: Immigration and Refugees
lead_paragraph: Guillermo Roberto Cabrera, a star player on Cuba’s national team, has left the squad and asked Mexican immigration officials to let him stay in the country. Cabrera and his father were staying at immigration offices in the southern state of Chiapas while their request for a 30-day transit permit was considered, an immigration agent said.
